DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to investigate the safety and efficacy of voriconazole for the treatment of candidemia in critically ill non-neutropenic patients
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Intended To Compare Treatment With Voriconazole To Treatment With Amphotericin Followed By Fluconazole In Patients With Candidemia, A Serious Fungus Infection Of The Blood.
